statements: SELECT * FROM replenishment_orders
SELECT order_id, product_id, stock_level FROM replenishment_orders
SELECT product_id, order_date FROM replenishment_orders WHERE stock_level > 100
SELECT order_date, stock_level, sales_trend FROM replenishment_orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-08-01'
SELECT * FROM replenishment_orders ORDER BY sales_trend DESC, stock_level ASC
SELECT * FROM replenishment_orders WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT order_id, stock_level FROM replenishment_orders WHERE sales_trend > 5 ORDER BY stock_level ASC
SELECT MAX(stock_level) AS max_stock FROM replenishment_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT order_id, product_id, stock_level, sales_trend FROM replenishment_orders WHERE stock_level < 50 AND sales_trend < 0 ORDER BY order_id
SELECT order_id, product_id, stock_level, order_date FROM replenishment_orders WHERE stock_level < 30 AND order_date >= '2022-04-01'
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level, sales_trend FROM products WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM products JOIN replenishment_orders ON products.product_id = replenishment_orders.product_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM products ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, sales_trend FROM products WHERE stock_level < 50 AND sales_trend > 0 ORDER BY sales_trend DESC;
SELECT * FROM replenishment_orders WHERE order_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, order_quantity FROM products JOIN replenishment_orders ON products.product_id = replenishment_orders.product_id WHERE order_quantity > 75 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(stock_level) AS max_stock, MIN(stock_level) AS min_stock FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM products ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_trend FROM products WHERE sales_trend = 'Steady';
SELECT * FROM replenishment_orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM products;
SELECT * FROM replenishment_orders WHERE status='pending';
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_date, s.sale_amount FROM products p JOIN sales_data s ON p.product_id = s.product_id;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level < 50 ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT s.transaction_id, p.product_name, o.order_date FROM sales_data s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id JOIN replenishment_orders o ON s.product_id = o.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, unit_price FROM products;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_cost FROM orders;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level, unit_price FROM products WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY stock_level DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_cost FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY order_date
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.name, s.sale_amount FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY s.sale_amount DESC;
SELECT r.reorder_date, p.name, r.reorder_quantity FROM replenishment r JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.id WHERE r.reorder_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY r.reorder_date ASC;
SELECT t.product_id, t.min_stock_level, p.stock_level FROM thresholds t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.id WHERE t.min_stock_level > p.stock_level ORDER BY p.stock_level ASC;
SELECT o.order_date, p.name, o.quantity FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.id WHERE o.quantity <= 10 ORDER BY o.quantity DESC;
